headline: Is It Too Late To Consider S&P Global (SPGI) After Strong Multi Year Share Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether S&P Global’s share price still makes sense at current levels, this article walks through what the numbers say about its value. The stock most recently closed at US$526.67, with returns of 1.5% over the past week, a 0.5% decline over the last month, 2.7% year to date and 1.9% over the past year, alongside longer term returns of 44.0% over three years and 66.3% over five years. Recent attention on S&P Global has centered on its role as a key provider of indices,...

headline: S&P Global 2026 Sustainability Outlook Highlights Growing Regulatory Demands For Clients
summary: S&P Global (NYSE:SPGI) has released its 2026 outlook on key sustainability trends and regulatory challenges for businesses. The report highlights 10 major themes, including more complex global climate policies, higher investment needs for adaptation and resilience, and diverging rules across regions. The findings are aimed at companies and investors assessing sustainability related risks and requirements in the run up to 2026. S&P Global, trading at $526.67, is a long standing data and...
